subject: what a surprise my last two response posts never made it to the group
author: bhali333
full_text:
Isn't it great when only the moderators and a select few get to post 
vendictive responses that actually make it to the group and without 
fear of reprisal.

Funny my responses to Frank S. and Frank Rat went unposted.

welcome to cold war moscow. betcha ten bucks this one don't make it 
through either.

Bruce
